name: Yogventures 2: Electric Boogaloo
description:
An entry to the Yogscast Jingle Game Jame.

The game is about the story of four heros who must deliever gifts to all neighbouring villages but be warned, evil lies on route, can you deliver all the gifts this Festag?

Controls

  • Keyboard and mouse only.
  • Left click to select menu items.
  • Left click to move players to adgacent tiles.
  • Left click and drag to use dice whilst in combat.
  • WASD to pan camera around in the world.
